ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Entity Positioning
- Pay attention to exact coordinates when placing interconnected entities
- Use the entity's drop_position property to determine correct placement of connected structures
- When placing mining drills, ensure the drop position aligns with the next entity in the production chain

### Errors with Resource Management
- Keep track of fuel (coal) levels and ensure sufficient quantity before inserting into entities
- Check inventory for required items before attempting to craft or place entities
- Monitor coal levels in burner entities to maintain continuous operation

### Errors with Production Flow
- When drills show "waiting for space in destination", ensure proper placement of receiving entities at the drill's drop position
- Monitor entity warnings to identify blockages in the production chain
- Verify that inserters are properly aligned with their pickup and drop positions

### Errors with Entity Definitions
- Import all required entity types (like BurnerMiningDrill) before attempting to use them in code
- Ensure proper prototype names are used when placing or referencing entities

### Errors with Entity Pickup
- Verify entity existence at a position before attempting to pick it up
- Double-check coordinates when attempting to pick up entities
- Ensure the correct entity type is specified when attempting pickup operations
